      scientists are getting ready to announce the possible existence of a second lick

      yes, and many more after that. so far i have never had any plans to stop

      sure

      how about...................... 'social distancing'

      yes

      as soon as i can find a way to do regular videos, at a pace which is even mildly acceptable

      sure

     i don't really have that yet, but it will be necessary to edit the new kind of videos i am making

      yes but not yet. probably for the next one

      yes

12.3.20  8:52 pm   What does "monkey fun" mean

      might be sarugaku

12.3.20  7:45 pm   What do you like to do in your spare time?

      there is no spare time. there is less time than is needed, not more

12.3.20  7:26 pm   Can you (Yourself) write messages without using the English Alphabet?

      yes

12.3.20  4:22 pm   Do you have the music written down for any of your songs?

     yes

     Like on sheet music?

     yes, but it is not written down after it's recorded. only before. it is usually the policy to make the recordings adhere quite strictly to the writing, but, it is not guaranteed

     If so may we have a peak at some?

      sure

12.3.20  3:24 pm   do you have any good chords you can tell us about?

      F

12.3.20  3:11 pm   i've written a couple songs that sound really cool when i imagine them in my head, but as soon as I sit down at the computer and try to record a drum track, or a keys track, or anything it starts sounding boring and absurd and i don't want to make it anymore... except i really do. what to do? what to do? what to do?

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

12.3.20  2:15 pm   ik this is a tired type of question, but whats the inspiration/meaning behind your video Time Mop? it's very different than other things you were making at the time and gives off some weird vibes.

      there are 2 elements to that, which came about completely separately. the audio, and the video that goes with it. The audio recording, called "time mop", was part of a series of 4 recordings i made in june 2009. my career felt way way too speculative for many years up until then, and i was getting very desperate to actually make some recordings. so in a fit of rage and desperation, i did "help, i'm trapped in the center of a rectangle", and 3 others, including "time mop". those are just instrumental music pieces, with no video.
     Then, later, around 2014, after i had finally begun actually making videos, sometimes song-videos, one of the types of videos i was doing would be music videos to go with songs i had already recorded. i had done some of these already, and they all were songs with lyrics. When there's lyrics, it usually gives you a pretty obvious guide for what might happen in the video. But, what if it's an entirely instrumental song? what would the video look like then? So i decided to try. Actually, i just remembered, i had actually begun to do work on this video as early as 2013, in the early stages of experimenting with video. and then i picked it up again after the regular video production schedule was underway. So it was originally an instrumental, in 2009, as a challenge to myself to do ANYTHING (besides textual non-video non-music), and the video in 2013 was a challenge to see if i could do a music video for a song without lyrics

12.3.20  1:54 pm   When you create your new song and begin on your new schedule,

     there's going to be more than 1 new song. also the latest one has already been done for a while, i am still doing the video for it. also there was another new song done before that which i still didn't finish the video for, because of an existential crisis i began having and am still having

     will you continue alternating between a random/monday/anything video and a song or just songs or something random.

     songs and non-songs. absolutely nothing random. randomness can go to hell and get banished

12.3.20  1:32 pm   What music do you listen to?

      respectful

12.3.20  12:47 pm   How do you respond to questions at all times of day?

     the key to that would be doing it at different times on different days. if i tried to answer at all times on the same day it would be a bit overboard

      Do you ever sleep?

     yes, i was asleep when you asked this

12.3.20  12:39 pm   Do you ever have a moment when listening to music where a random sound (like a door closing) is in the same like key as the music and it kind of formed a chord? 

      sure

12.3.20  12:33 pm   What key is the world in?

      you

12.3.20  12:01 pm   in "a play featuring an iphone power block and mechanical pencil" you mention how fucking shitty valentine's day is, so you actually hate valentine's day 

      no, those view are not my own. i did write it, but, it is satire. this is often an important distinction to make

      no but it is useful for doing illusions

      they're pretty good

12.3.20  9:46 am   you mentioned in the song "la de da de da de da de day oh" that "2 + 2 has been 4 for so many darn oh lord". but i would like to ask, how many years is "so many darn years"?

     it's not important. the important part is it sounds like it says "4" twice in a row. any further numerical consideration after that would overwhelm the mind

     i have not been able to get good sleep since this popped into my head.

      have you tried using 2 beds

12.3.20  9:38 am   are you wanting your next song to be a surprise?

      surprise is just one of many elements i normally use

12.3.20  9:30 am   Help me bill.  I'm currently searching for something that I'm truly passionate about, but whenever I find an activity that sparks my interest, I never stay interested in it for long.  This is starting to become very frustrating.

      how about being an adventurer

      Ab, and more

12.2.20  9:19 pm   When do you think your next song/video will come out 

      i thought i knew, but i was wrong. so to turn the tables i've decided to talk about my wrongness, which i am right about
